import { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import contactImg from '../assets/img/contact-img.svg' export const Contact = () => { const formInitialDetails = { firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phone: '', message: '' } const [formDetails, setFormDetails] = useState(formInitialDetails); const [buttonText, setButtonText] = useState('submit'); const [status, setStatus] = useState({}); const onFormUpdate = (category, value) => { setFormDetails({ ...formDetails, [category]: value }) } const handleSubmit = async () => { e.preventDefualt(); setButtonText('Sending...') } return (
